XRQuadLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRQuadLayer interface of the WebXR Device API is a layer that takes up a flat rectangular space in the virtual environment. An XRQuadLayer has no thickness. It is a two-dimensional object positioned and oriented in 3D space. The position of a quad refers to the center of the quad. Only the front of the layer is visible.
